name: react-drive-in
description: React component supporting background videos and playlists.

scripts.build: npm run lint; npm run transpile; npm run build-browser; npm run build-browser-min; npm run styles
scripts.styles: lessc --autoprefix='last 5 versions' src/react-drive-in.less > dist/react-drive-in.css && lessc --autoprefix='last 5 versions' src/react-drive-in-multi.less > dist/react-drive-in-multi.css
scripts.build-browser: browserify src/react-drive-in.jsx -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --outfile dist/react-drive-in.js --standalone ReactDriveIn
scripts.build-browser-min: browserify src/react-drive-in.jsx -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --standalone ReactDriveIn | uglifyjs -mc > dist/react-drive-in.min.js
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build-browser && npm run styles' src
